lead_paragraph: LORGE--Dana, on April 23, 2016. Beloved daughter of Elaine and Morton Lorge. Well known for her cabaret, theatre, singing and as a stand up comedienne. She received many awards for her outstanding performances. She will be missed by her multitude of friends and family. 1/3
